entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:19 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rock River 11:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
Temperature: -24.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -27.3°C
Wind: E 50 km/h gust 77 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Blowing snow. Wind east 20 km/h except 50 gusting to 70 near the Richardson mountains. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:39 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 22.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h except easterly 60 gusting to 80 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:39 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h except easterly 60 gusting to 80 near the Richardson mountains early in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:39 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
